Property.name: TitleStyle
Property.HelpText: Choose a style for "Press START" and the copyright text on the title screen. By default SA2 or SA2B is chosen depending the menu you're using. NOTE: "Custom" will disable all menu-related code, including the logo.

Property.name: ButtonStyle
Property.HelpText: Choose a style for the B-button prompt. By default DC or GC is chosen depending the menu you're using.

Property.name: LifeStyle
Property.HelpText: Choose a style for life icons. "GameCube (Custom)" uses ones based on the GC 1ups. By default original is chosen.

Property.name: ItemStyle
Property.HelpText: Choose a style for item box icons. By default DC or GC is chosen depending the menu you're using.

Property.name: KartStyle
Property.HelpText: Choose a style for kart race icons. By default DC or GC is chosen depending the menu you're using.

Property.name: OptionsCompat
Property.HelpText: Disables the custom texture positioning. Enable this if you're using a mod with its own options.pak to avoid conflict. Otherwise, leave this alone or it'll just give your menu squashed icons.

Property.name: RumbleStyle
Property.HelpText: Choose the icon for the Rumble setting in the Options menu.

Property.name: SpeakerStyle
Property.HelpText: Choose the icon for the Stereo/Mono setting for the Options menu.

Property.name: MemcardStyle
Property.HelpText: Choose the icon for File Select in the Options menu.
